# Support

Thank you for using the Memberstack CLI! If you need help, please review the following options:

## Documentation

- See the [README](../README.md) for setup and usage instructions.
- Review the [CONTRIBUTING](CONTRIBUTING.md) guide for development and PR tips.

## Bug Reports

- Please open an issue on GitHub with clear steps to reproduce, expected vs. actual behavior, and any relevant logs or screenshots.

## Feature Requests

- Open a GitHub issue labeled as a feature request. Describe your use case and why it would be helpful.

## Self-Service

- Check closed issues and discussions for similar questions or solutions.
- Visit the [Memberstack documentation](https://docs.memberstack.com) for general Memberstack platform help. Issues not related to this CLI tool may be closed without notice.

---

Thank you for helping make this project better! If you have feedback on the support process, please open an issue.
